explanations.machine learning: The paper discusses using AI-based prediction algorithms (GRU and LSTM) for forecasting inflation and stock index changes, which are machine learning techniques.

explanations.long short-term memory: The paper explicitly mentions using LSTM as one of the prediction algorithms for forecasting inflation.
explanations.LSTM: LSTM is directly mentioned as one of the AI-based prediction algorithms used in the study.
explanations.recurrent neural network: Both GRU and LSTM are types of recurrent neural networks, which are used in the study for time series forecasting.
